name: Invaders from the Third Dimension
description:
A retro space game with 3D graphics and modern controls. Eliminate the aliens and save your species.

This game adds modern controls to retro gameplay, allowing you to shoot at any forward angle. You can aim diagonally at enemies. Other shoot-'em-ups just let you slide horizontally and shoot vertically.

Your ship is equipped with 3-round burst fire by default. After you turn to aim at an enemy, you can fire a burst of 3 laser beams as your ship rotates back to straight. This allows the player to shoot arcs of laser beams and spray-'n-pray. With the right rhythm, you can practically have automatic fire. A skilled player can also collect the Automatic power up for truly full-auto fire!

3D Graphics, Retro Gameplay

  • 3D models, not pixelated 2D images
  • Real-time dynamic lighting
  • Realistic explosions with particles and smoke

Better Controls

  • Rotate your ship
  • Shoot at any angle
  • Unleash arcs of 3-round burst fire

Sick Soundtrack

  • Our 80's-style synthwave soundtrack will get you in the zone.

Save your game

  • We automatically saves your game at the start of each level. You won't have to mess around with save states or passwords.

Download Today!

  • With action-packed retro gameplay, modern controls, and 3D graphics, it's time to download now and have a blast!
